title: Bug 23935 - Text widget with Tree parent does not lose focus
description: Both widgets are children of the shell. The right tree and text only work on Windows. We can probably work around by creating the text editor as a sibling of the tree and moving it above the tree.
OB: When you click anywhere in the tree, the tree gets focus. On Linux, the text never loses focus when you click on the tree. The text widget is a child of the tree. This results in platform UI bug 2470.
EB: The expected behavior is that when clicking on the tree, the tree should gain focus and the text widget should lose focus.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the application. 
2. Click anywhere in the tree widget. 
3. Observe that the tree gains focus, and the text widget does not lose focus on Linux.
